snippet: A former Harper's Bazaar intern's lawsuit has led us to ask: Do you have a story of an internship that changed or ruined your life? Or telling examples of how the free labor of interns is built into the business model of publishing?
abstract: A former Harper's Bazaar intern's lawsuit has led us to ask: Do you have a story of an internship that changed or ruined your life? Or telling examples of how the free labor of interns is built into the business model of publishing?

headline.main: Are Media Interns Merely Exploited Labor? Share Your Experiences
